remarks:
The Axiom of Pairing of ZF set theory.  It was derived as theorem ~ axpr above and is therefore redundant, but we state it as a separate axiom here so that its uses can be identified more easily.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2006.) 

---

 The Axiom of Pairing of IZF set theory.  Axiom 2 of [Crosilla] p. "Axioms of CZF and IZF", except (a) unnecessary quantifiers are removed, and (b) Crosilla has a biconditional rather than an implication (but the two are equivalent by ~ bm1.3ii ).  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2006.)
statement:
ax-pr $p |- E. z A. w ( ( w = x \/ w = y ) -> w e. z ) $.
$d w x z $.
$d w y z $.
